Package com.i2group.apollo.adminservice

The Intelligence Analysis Platform admin service provides clients with the ability to perform administrative functions on the whole system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAdminService A set of methods for performing administrative functions on a running instance of the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
 

Class Summary
SchemaValidationException.Fault Contains information about the enclosing SchemaValidationException.
 

Exception Summary
SchemaValidationException The exception raised when an attempt is made to use an invalid schema.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.adminservice Description

The Intelligence Analysis Platform admin service provides clients with the ability to perform administrative functions on the whole system.

The admin service contains four methods that affect fundamental features of the Intelligence Analysis Platform.

Web methodDescription
SetChartingSchemes Specifies the charting schemes for this instance of the Intelligence Analysis Platform.
SetRepositoryName Specifies a human-readable name that identifies the Analysis Repository to users of the Intelligence Analysis Platform. The name can be updated at any time.
SetSchema Specifies the schema for this instance of the Intelligence Analysis Platform. If no Analysis Repository is present, a new one is created. Subsequent calls update the schema, subject to strict rules about how the new schema can differ from the current one.
SetSecuritySchema Specifies the security schema for this instance of the Intelligence Analysis Platform. Subsequent calls update the security schema, subject to strict rules about how the new schema can differ from the current one.

Note: Each "Set" method has a corresponding "Get" method that retrieves the existing setting (if any) from the Intelligence Analysis Platform.

Since:
2.0
